meanings.sent1: The granulose sand felt rough under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The baker's hands were covered in granulose flour.
meanings.sent3: The granulose sugar spilled all over the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a granulose quality, like sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The granulose texture of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear.

meanings.definition: Covered in or containing small grains or particles.
meanings.sent1: The granulose soil was perfect for planting seeds.
meanings.sent2: The granulose surface of the moon reflected the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The granulose paint on the walls gave the room a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: His granulose beard made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent5: The granulose appearance of the cake made it look unappetizing.
